transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Ji namaskar sir.
Executive: Namaskar main Sahaj Industry se bol raha hun Jammu se.
Customer: Ji ji bataiye sir ji ji.
Customer: Bhaiya koi bhi inquiry na achi dhang ki inquiry nahi aa rahi mere ko yaar.
Executive: Achcha sir inquiry nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Char mahine ho gaye hain ha matlab kuch mature nahi ho raha aapne diya hota hai 1230 aage bande ko phone karo to wo bolte ji ek bhi chahiye almari ka to pata nahi kaise inquiry aap dete ho yaar mere samajh nahi aa rahi.
Customer: Matlab koi verification hi nahi hai inquiry ki aap waha pe dalte 1230 1530 ek crore dedh crore ki inquiry value to waha to wo ek ek almari ki baat kar raha hai banda aage.
Executive: Retail ki jyada aa rahi hai matlab sari lead aise aa rahi hai sir aisa to sari lead me nahi ho raha hota.
Customer: Sari lead aise aa rahi hai bulk wala kuch nahi aa raha sari aa rahi hai ek almari dedh almari do almari ka yaha se 500 kilometer thodi jayegi ek almari.
Executive: Ek aaya char piece ka hai.
Customer: 15 piece ho usme banda soch sakta hai yaha 15 aa gaye 20 aa gaye aisa kuch hai hi nahi.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Mujhe to mujhe to keh rahe ho sare B to B kam hai ye aur ho raha hai ye B to C sara inquiry.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai sir ek bar na main aapke account me video editing karata hun aur usko karwata hun theek hai.
Customer: Aap to kal video meeting karata hun abhi Piyush ji aapke account dekh rahe hain wo abhi dusri call par the main unka manager hun mere pass call aa gayi hai aapko call karenge matlab koi serious message nahi hai kisi me main kitni complaint kar chuka hun aaj se mila to 10 complaint ho gayi meri.
Executive: Sir dekhiye na aapko koi need hi nahi hai.
Customer: Sir dekho direct call direct call to aa raha hoga na aapke pass direct call bhi nahi aa raha hai.
Executive: Dekhiye direct call aayega ab is mahine aapki do call aayi hai abhi aapke pass isko trust seal me kyu nahi update kara le rahe ho aap.
Customer: Ab jo leads aapki aa rahi hai na Srinagar se wo sari sabse bekar leads hai wo Kashmir se jo aa rahi hai.
Customer: Uski koi worth nahi hai.
Customer: Wo keh rahe hain ji koi bachcha kar raha hai ji koi behen ne kar diya koi beti ne kar diya wo is tarah se wo ha ji ho gaya hamara humne le bhi liya.
Customer: Matlab panch minute me le liya unhone inquiry aa rahi hai panch minute me le le rahe hain.
Customer: Mera kehne ka matlab jo aap inquiry de rahe ho usme kuch na uski kuch worth honi chahiye inquiry ki main bhi apna time invest karke aur inquiry kar raha hun.
Executive: Sari lead hum verify karte hain sir but sari lead to convert nahi hogi na sir kuch buyer baat karenge kuch aap local me kaise pan India me kar sakte hain.
Customer: Main pan India me kaise karunga single piece ke liye yaar aap mujhe baat nahi samajh rahe.
Customer: Ab tak inquiry aayegi ji model kitchen chahiye 40 square foot ki to kaise jayegi yaha se ban ke waha ek kitchen.
Customer: Pan India ke liye bulk order chahiye.
Customer: Ab single single thodi na yaha se main uth ke Trivandrum chala jaunga ek single model kitchen ke liye ya single sofe ke liye.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: Ab competition bhi to hai market ke andar ye thodi na ki J and K me koi Pakistan se mal aa raha hai yaha pe ban raha hai aur udhar ja raha hai India me.
Executive: Main ek bar puri setting refresh karta hun sir ek bar aapko video meeting se connect karta hun aapse setting change karke.
Customer: Video meeting kare inko bolne ka koi dhang se kare main to export ke liye soch raha tha mujhe to bhagwan ne bacha liya maine usse paise nahi kharch kiye.
Executive: Are nahi nahi sir domestic me kam milega export India mart me aisa kuch nahi ki India mart to 25 saal purani company hai sir branded company hai.
Customer: Jo manufacturer meri baat nahi aap follow kar rahe jo manufacturer hai usko bulk me order chahiye hota hai usko single nahi chahiye single chahiye to region reach chahiye hota hai 20 30 40 50 100 kilometer ke andar andar aap doge 400 kilometer ka to uska transportation single piece ka itna pad jata hai ki wo jayega kaise mal waha pe.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Main almari bana kisi ko rate bhi de dunga to uska kiraya matlab main aapko jyada lead main aapko local ki jyada dunga hai na.
Customer: Agar single de di hai aapne individual lead de di to local ki do 20 50 kilometer ke andar jo main mature bhi kar saku agar single lead aa rahi hai Kolkata se Ahmedabad se Gujarat se Uttarakhand se UP se usko kya karna hai maine.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul sahi baat hai.
Customer: Do to main use soch bhi lu.
Executive: Ha bulk me aana hai 50 60.
Executive: Main ek bar pura profile ko ek bar review kar leta hun dhang se aur isme sir ye bataiye rating wagera bhi jo aap deal karte hain profile par jo rating wagera hai us par bhi thoda sa review rating par bhi kam kijiye aap rating badhayenge usse bhi fayda milega aapko buyer ko aur bid use karte rahiyega man lijiye usse kya hoga call badhenge bid use karenge to call bhi aapke kam ho jate hain to bid use jarur kijiye aap.
Customer: Bid use kya use karu mujhe mujhe mujhe ab khud idea lagta hai.
Executive: Dekho demotivate hoga chodna nahi hai ek bar conversion aane lagega to pura aa jayega sir conversion ye main bata raha hun aapko.
Customer: Abhi conversion ho hi nahi raha ek bhi conversion nahi hua yaar afsos is baat ka hai lead aati hai wo hai ki main kya bolu yaar.
Executive: Sir aap India mart me inquiry kar raha tha wo banda matlab aise hona chahiye na lene wala hona chahiye.
Customer: aise hi le raha hai aaj aaj inquiry kar raha hai 10 mahine baad me kam shuru karna hai sofe ka to wo hai is tarah se lead aa rahi hai.
Executive: Thoda sa mujhe time dijiye main aapko abhi turant setting karke call karwata hun thoda sa time dijiye mujhe aap.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving good quality buyleads.

- No conversion of buyleads.

- Receiving retail inquiries instead of bulk.

- Dissatisfied with leads from Srinagar.

- Direct calls not being received.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to get video editing done.

- Executive will refresh the profile settings.

- Executive will connect via video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after setting changes.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, profile, rating, b2b, b2c
